## [See Also](/documentation/driverkit/mach_timebase_info_t#see-also)

### [Mach Timebase](/documentation/driverkit/mach_timebase_info_t#Mach-Timebase)

[`mach_absolute_time`](/documentation/driverkit/mach_absolute_time)Returns current value of a clock that increments monotonically in tick units (starting at an arbitrary point), this clock does not increment while the system is asleep.[`mach_continuous_time`](/documentation/driverkit/mach_continuous_time)Returns current value of a clock that increments monotonically in tick units (starting at an arbitrary point), including while the system is asleep.[`mach_timebase_info`](/documentation/driverkit/mach_timebase_info-c.func)Returns fraction to multiply a value in mach tick units with to convert it to nanoseconds.[Time Scales](/documentation/driverkit/3223112-time_scales)
